title: LocationFeatureSpecification
description: Specifies a location feature by providing a structured value representing a feature of an accommodation as a property-value pair of varying degrees of formality.

validFrom.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

validThrough.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

hoursAvailable.description: The hours during which this service or contact is available.
